response.name: home
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Success",
    "data": {
        "application": "Januscope - Uptime & SSL Monitoring System",
        "version": "1.0.0",
        "apiVersion": "v1",
        "company": "Sky World Limited",
        "baseUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876",
        "documentation": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/",
        "endpoints": {
            "System": [
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/health",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/health",
                    "description": "Health check endpoint",
                    "requiresAuth": false
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/health",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/health",
                    "description": "Health check (versioned)",
                    "requiresAuth": false
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/status",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/status",
                    "description": "System status and uptime",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/engines",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/engines",
                    "description": "Engine status and health",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/roles",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/roles",
                    "description": "List all roles",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/roles",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/roles",
                    "description": "Create new role",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/roles/{roleId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/roles/{roleId}",
                    "description": "Get role by ID",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/roles",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/roles",
                    "description": "Update role",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "DELETE",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/roles/{roleId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/roles/{roleId}",
                    "description": "Delete role",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/countries",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/countries",
                    "description": "List all countries",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/countries",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/countries",
                    "description": "Create new country",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/countries/{countryCode}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/countries/{countryCode}",
                    "description": "Get country by code",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/countries",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/countries",
                    "description": "Update country",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "DELETE",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/countries/{countryCode}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/countries/{countryCode}",
                    "description": "Delete country",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/countries/bulk-import",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/countries/bulk-import",
                    "description": "Bulk import countries",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/branches",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/branches",
                    "description": "List all branches",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/branches",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/branches",
                    "description": "Create new branch",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/branches/{branchId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/branches/{branchId}",
                    "description": "Get branch by ID",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/branches",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/branches",
                    "description": "Update branch",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "DELETE",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/branches/{branchId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/branches/{branchId}",
                    "description": "Delete branch",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/branches/bulk-import",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/branches/bulk-import",
                    "description": "Bulk import branches",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/locations",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/locations",
                    "description": "List all locations",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/locations",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/locations",
                    "description": "Create new location",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/locations/{locationId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/locations/{locationId}",
                    "description": "Get location by ID",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/locations",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/locations",
                    "description": "Update location",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "DELETE",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/locations/{locationId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/locations/{locationId}",
                    "description": "Delete location",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/locations/bulk-import",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/locations/bulk-import",
                    "description": "Bulk import locations",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/templates",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/templates",
                    "description": "List all notification templates",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/templates",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/templates",
                    "description": "Create new template",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/templates/{templateId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/templates/{templateId}",
                    "description": "Get template by ID",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/templates",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/templates",
                    "description": "Update template",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "DELETE",
                    "path": "/api/v1/system/templates/{templateId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/system/templates/{templateId}",
                    "description": "Delete template",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/",
                    "description": "Interactive API documentation with examples",
                    "requiresAuth": false
                }
            ],
            "Monitoring": [
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/monitoring/stats",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/monitoring/stats",
                    "description": "Real-time monitoring statistics",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                }
            ],
            "Notifications": [
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/notifications/channels",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/notifications/channels",
                    "description": "Active notification channels",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                }
            ],
            "Jobs": [
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/jobs",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/jobs",
                    "description": "Scheduled background jobs",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                }
            ],
            "Authentication": [
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/auth/login",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/auth/login",
                    "description": "Authenticate user and get JWT tokens",
                    "requiresAuth": false
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/auth/register",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/auth/register",
                    "description": "Register new user account",
                    "requiresAuth": false
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/auth/refresh",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/auth/refresh",
                    "description": "Refresh expired access token",
                    "requiresAuth": false
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/auth/me",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/auth/me",
                    "description": "Get authenticated user profile",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                }
            ],
            "Other": [
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users",
                    "description": "List users with filters (role, status, branch)",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users",
                    "description": "Create user (admin only, auto-approved)",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/{id}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/{id}",
                    "description": "Get user profile and details",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/{id}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/{id}",
                    "description": "Update user profile information",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "DELETE",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/{id}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/{id}",
                    "description": "Soft delete user (admin only)",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/pending",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/pending",
                    "description": "List users awaiting admin approval",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/{id}/approve",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/{id}/approve",
                    "description": "Approve pending user registration",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/{id}/reject",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/{id}/reject",
                    "description": "Reject user registration with reason",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/{id}/activate",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/{id}/activate",
                    "description": "Activate deactivated user account",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/{id}/deactivate",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/{id}/deactivate",
                    "description": "Temporarily disable user account",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/{id}/password",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/{id}/password",
                    "description": "Change user password (self or admin)",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/users/{id}/role",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/users/{id}/role",
                    "description": "Change user role (admin only)",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/bulk/import",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/bulk/import",
                    "description": "Bulk import groups/members (JSON/XML/CSV/Excel)",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/bulk/export",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/bulk/export",
                    "description": "Bulk export all data (format=json|xml|csv|excel)",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/bulk/template",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/bulk/template",
                    "description": "Download import template (format=csv|excel)",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                }
            ],
            "Services": [
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/services",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/services",
                    "description": "List all monitored services with status",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/services",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/services",
                    "description": "Add new service to monitor",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/services/{id}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/services/{id}",
                    "description": "Get service configuration and current status",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/services/{id}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/services/{id}",
                    "description": "Update service configuration",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "DELETE",
                    "path": "/api/v1/services/{id}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/services/{id}",
                    "description": "Remove service from monitoring",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/services/{id}/uptime",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/services/{id}/uptime",
                    "description": "Get uptime history and statistics",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/services/{id}/ssl",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/services/{id}/ssl",
                    "description": "Get SSL certificate details and expiry",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/services/{id}/incidents",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/services/{id}/incidents",
                    "description": "Get downtime incidents and alerts",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                }
            ],
            "Dashboard": [
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/dashboard/summary",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/dashboard/summary",
                    "description": "Real-time dashboard: uptime %, SSL status, active incidents",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                }
            ],
            "Contact Groups": [
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/contact-groups",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/contact-groups",
                    "description": "List all notification contact groups",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/contact-groups",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/contact-groups",
                    "description": "Create new contact group",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}",
                    "description": "Get group details and members",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}",
                    "description": "Update group name/description",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "DELETE",
                    "path": "/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}",
                    "description": "Delete contact group",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}/members",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}/members",
                    "description": "List all members in group",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "POST",
                    "path": "/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}/members",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/contact-groups/{id}/members",
                    "description": "Add member to group (email/phone/telegram)",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/contact-groups/{groupId}/members/{memberId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/contact-groups/{groupId}/members/{memberId}",
                    "description": "Update member contact info",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "DELETE",
                    "path": "/api/v1/contact-groups/{groupId}/members/{memberId}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/contact-groups/{groupId}/members/{memberId}",
                    "description": "Remove member from group",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                }
            ],
            "Settings": [
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/settings",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/settings",
                    "description": "List all system settings",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "GET",
                    "path": "/api/v1/settings/{key}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/settings/{key}",
                    "description": "Get specific setting value",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                },
                {
                    "method": "PUT",
                    "path": "/api/v1/settings/{key}",
                    "fullUrl": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/settings/{key}",
                    "description": "Update setting value",
                    "requiresAuth": true
                }
            ]
        },
        "quickStart": {
            "1. Health Check": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/health",
            "2. API Documentation": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/",
            "3. Register User": "POST http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/auth/register",
            "4. Login": "POST http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/auth/login",
            "5. List Services": "GET http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/services (with Bearer token)"
        },
        "examples": {
            "Register User": {
                "method": "POST",
                "body": {
                    "lastName": "Njenga",
                    "firstName": "James",
                    "email": "jamesnjenga@skyworld.ac.ke",
                    "password": "BlahBlah@123!"
                },
                "headers": {

                "url": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/auth/register"
            },
            "Login": {

                "body": {
                    "identifier": "jamesnjenga@skyworld.ac.ke",
                    "password": "BlahBlah@123!"
                },
                "headers": {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                "url": "http://127.0.0.1:9876/api/v1/auth/login"
            }
        },
        "statistics": {
            "totalEndpoints": 76,
            "publicEndpoints": 6,
            "protectedEndpoints": 70,
            "methods": [
                "GET",
                "POST",

                "DELETE"

        },
        "authentication": "Most endpoints require Bearer token authentication",

response.name: incidents
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Services retrieved",
    "data": [
        {
            "serviceId": 7,
            "name": "AWS",
            "url": "https://aws.amazon.com",
            "checkIntervalSeconds": 60,
            "timeoutMs": 10000,
            "maxRetries": 3,
            "retryDelayMs": 5000,
            "currentStatus": "UP",
            "lastCheckedAt": "2025-11-30T17:30:25.247256Z",
            "customHeaders": null,
